channel.title: God command needed

item.title: God command needed
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Add this before

updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

:

pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100;For godmode on and for godmode off add this before

updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44;

Read full topic

item.title: God command needed

item.description:
@judgechaos wrote:

i dont want a god command that makes u fly…

lemee make this simple i want a god command that makes u invincible…

item.title: God command needed
item.dc:creator: @Jpspkz Jpspkz
item.description:
@Jpspkz wrote:

it makes you 1 hp…?

i use same one: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 2) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } and I don’t get 1 hp o.O

Read full topic

item.title: God command needed
item.dc:creator: @judgechaos judgechaos
item.description:
@judgechaos wrote:

hey guys… i need a god command BUT! not this 1…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 2) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 2){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

i need a god command that makes u 1 hp but it stays 1hp wenever u get damaged…

thanks in advanced

Read full topic
